biography: Catalin Hanga (PhD) is a Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer, currently working at the Open Innovation AI Lab of Iveco Group in Switzerland. Among his recent projects include developing a documentation management chatbot based on Retrieval Augmented Generation, as well as implementing an autonomous LLM agent using the ReAct framework. Prior to this, he briefly worked in a similar role for a startup in the insurtech industry. He has obtained a PhD in Mathematics from the University of York, UK, and holds a M.Sc. in Physics from the University of Bucharest. During his M.Sc. studies, he also worked as a researcher at CERN in Geneva, Switzerland, analyzing experimental data collected by the detectors of the Large Hadron Collider. He has previously given public presentations at academic events, as well as industry conferences.
name: Catalin
